trans-unit.source: Provides a user interface for selecting an URL that indicates the location of an XSL file.
<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.XslUrlEditor> is a <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor> that provides a dialog for selecting a URL that indicates the location of an XSL file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.XslUrlEditor> 是<xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor>提供一個對話方塊以選取表示 XSL 檔案的位置的 URL。

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.XslUrlEditor" /> class.
Gets the caption to display on the selection dialog window.
The caption to display on the selection dialog window.
trans-unit.target: 要顯示在選取 對話方塊視窗的標題。

trans-unit.source: Gets the file name filter string for the editor.
This is used to determine the items that appear in the file list of the dialog box.
A string that contains information about the file filtering options available in the dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含篩選的對話方塊可用選項的檔案的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.XslUrlEditor.Filter%2A> property specifies a filter string with two filter options: one for XSL files (*.xsl;\*.xslt), and one for all files (\*.\*).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.XslUrlEditor.Filter%2A>屬性指定兩個篩選選項的篩選字串： 一個用於 XSL 檔案 (*.xsl;\*。xslt)，另一個用於所有檔案 (\*。\*)。

trans-unit.source: A filter string contains one or more filter options.
trans-unit.target: 篩選字串，包含一或多個篩選選項。

trans-unit.source: Each filter option contains a description of the filter, followed by the vertical bar (|) and the filter pattern.
trans-unit.target: 每個篩選選項包含描述的篩選，後面接著分隔號 (|) 和篩選模式。

trans-unit.source: The strings for different filtering options are separated by the vertical bar.
trans-unit.target: 不同的篩選選項的字串會以分隔號分隔。

trans-unit.source: The following is an example of a filter string that contains two filter options: "`XSLT Files (*.xslt)|*.xslt|All Files (*.*)|*.*`".
trans-unit.target: 包含兩個篩選選項的篩選條件字串的範例如下:"`XSLT Files (*.xslt)|*.xslt|All Files (*.*)|*.*`"。

trans-unit.source: You can specify several filter patterns in a filter option by separating the filter patterns with semicolons.
trans-unit.target: 您可以指定篩選選項中的數種篩選模式以分號區隔篩選模式。

trans-unit.source: The following is an example of a filter string in which the first filter option specifies two filter patterns: "`XSL Files (*.xslt;*.xsl)|*.xslt;*.xsl|All Files (*.*)|*.*`".
trans-unit.target: 中的第一個篩選選項會指定兩個篩選條件模式的篩選條件字串的範例如下:"`XSL Files (*.xslt;*.xsl)|*.xslt;*.xsl|All Files (*.*)|*.*`"。

trans-unit.source: Gets the options for the URL builder to use.
A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.UrlBuilderOptions" /> that indicates the options for the URL builder to use.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.UrlBuilderOptions" /> ，指出要使用的 URL 產生器的選項。
